about_the_game:
Are you on the lookout for some incredible battlers to use in your futuristic and science-fiction games? Look no further!

Sci-Fi Battler pack is filled with androids, aliens, and sophisticated machinery - the essentials you need in your space adventure. Hand-painted by Michael Galefire, this pack is a perfect companion to his Sci-Fi Battlebacks.

FEATURES:

Hand-painted battlers, sized for use in RPG Maker MV.
25 Battlers, ranging from smaller enemies to large bosses.
Aliens, androids, robot weapons, mutants and more.
Royalty-free use in your RPG Maker projects!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series only
* OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker Series
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Sci-Fi Battler Pack" and "RPG Maker MV - Sci-Fi Battler Pack" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Sci-Fi Battler Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: Alien landscapes or battles in space, get ready with a pack of battlers like no other!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
